title: Galactic.Civilizations.III.Altarian.Prophecy-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W 
                       .the leading force.                 
                                                              
                        proudly presents                      
           Galactic Civilizations III - Altarian Prophecy            
                      (c) Stardock Entertainment                        
                                                                        
    27-09-2016......Release Date  Protection.................Steam
    Strategy...........Game Type  Disk(s)....................1 DVD


  RELEASE NOTES

 Lead the newly founded Terran Alliance in its first encounter with the  
 Altarian Confederation. You must forge an alliance and unite with them  
 in order to combat the terrifying threats of the Drengin Empire and     
 the Dominion of the Korx. But, beware - just as victory seems within    
 your grasp, an even deadlier threat emerges from the shadows to try     
 and take it away.                                                       
                                                                         
  Features:                                                               
                                                                         
 Discover the story of the alliance between mankind and the Altarians    
 during a new campaign. Spanning 3 missions, you must do whatever it     
 takes to overcome the Dominion of the Korx and their mysterious         
 masters, the Drath.                                                     
                                                                         
 Customize your ships with classic ship styles! This DLC includes the    
 Drath and Korx styles.                                                  
                                                                         
 Explore dozens of classic ship parts and build some of your favorite    
 Galactic Civilizations II ships. 
   
                                                                         
 NOTE: 
                                                      
 Made standalone, fully updated and featuring all previously released    
 DLC!                                          
                                                         
 1. Unpack the release 
 2. Mount or burn image 
 3. Install  
 4. Copy the cracked content from the SKIDROW folder and into the main   
    install folder and overwrite         
 5. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as      
    secure/trusted in your antivirus program                             
 6. Play the game        
 7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!
